sendMove(String, String, ArrayList<Integer>) - Method in class abalone.client.AbaloneClient
 
sendMove(String, String, ArrayList<Integer>) - Method in interface abalone.protocol.ClientProtocol
When the client has come up with a move, it sends it to the server: MOVE + DELIMITER + player name + DELIMITER + direction + DELIMITER + index of field (multiple times) + EOC All marbles involved in the move should be included, each separated by DELIMITER.
